sqlMap.statement:
SELECT COUNT(NONSYNCZTRANQUENAME) FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIQM01
NONSYNCZTRANQUENAME LIKE CONCAT( '%' , #searchNonSynczTranQueName# , '%')

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @NO := @NO + 1 AS ROWNO, NONSYNCZTRANQUENAME AS NONSYNCZTRANQUENAME, EAIQUEBZWKCTNT AS QUEBZWKCTNT, QUEUSEYN AS QUEUSEYN, (CASE QUEUSEYN WHEN '1' THEN '사용' ELSE '미사용' END) AS QUEUSEYNNAME, QUEUSAGDSTCD AS QUEUSAGDSTCD, (CASE QUEUSAGDSTCD WHEN '1' THEN '송신' WHEN '2' THEN '수신' WHEN '3' THEN '송신에러' ELSE '수신에러' END) AS QUEUSAGDSTNAME, EAIBZWKDSTCD AS BZWKDSTCD, EAIQUEBZWKDTALSCTNT AS QUEBZWKDTALSCTNT, EAISEVRINSTNCNAME AS SEVRINSTNCNAME FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIQM01, (SELECT @NO := 0) R
NONSYNCZTRANQUENAME LIKE CONCAT( '%' , #searchNonSynczTranQueName# , '%')
ORDER BY NONSYNCZTRANQUENAME ) ORGTABLE WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum#
